mapper.select: SELECT `id` as `id`, `name` as `name`, `age` as `age`, `gender` as `gender`, `photo_path` as `photoPath`, `phone_number` as `phoneNumber`, `driver_school` as `driverSchool`, `is_del` as `isDel` FROM `t_candidate`
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_candidate( id, name, age, gender, photo_path, phone_number, driver_school, is_del ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{photoPath}, #{phoneNumber}, #{driverSchool}, #{isDel} )
